content:
write an email in french to Lea and Nathan to highlight:
1) this white car wasn't originally parked on that spot
2) now that it is parked there is quite annoying to anyone because we all use that spot to unter straight into the elevator
3) ask them to ask the car owner to put in the past he was assigned to (as far as I suppose it right) or on the -2 that is still empty and suggest them to keep that place free because is very useful
